Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.description:
'It was said a special Armor of the Dikastes|set of armor meant only for the 'Dikastes' was kept in Atlantis. Its legendary pieces were held by Atlantean Polemarchs who kept them in the: - Fortified Doma of Mestor|Doma of Mestor (Isu)|Mestor
- Doma of Elasippos|Doma of Elasippos
- Doma of Azaes|Doma of Azaes
- Fortified Doma of Mneseas|Fortified Doma of Mneseas
- Fortified Doma of Autochthonos|Fortified Doma of Autochthonos'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis'

General_Description: '''Rightfully Yours''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra sought to recover the [[Armor of the Dikastes|set]] of [[armor]] that was rightfully hers.
Section_Dialogue:
While near the [[Doma of Atlas|Doma]] of [[Atlas (Isu)|Atlas]], Kassandra came across the scene of a deceased [[Soldier|guard]]. She approached the body and recovered a note. *'''Kassandra:''' ''What's this? A message.'' :'''Protect Yourselves'''
''The armor that's come into your possession represents protection not meant for us. It was forged for the ''[[Dikastes]]'', but who's to say they deserve all the power in [[Atlantis]]? In this realm of [[Isu]] vs [[human]], a just ''Dikastes'' will let us, the [[Atlantis|Atlantean]] [[Atlantean Polemarch|Polemarch]]s, keep it for ourselves. Until we are found out, the pieces are spread amongst you in the [[Fortified Doma of Mestor|Doma of Mestor]], [[Doma of Elasippos|Elasippos]], [[Fortified Doma of Mneseas|Mneseas]], [[Doma of Azaes|Azaes]], and [[Fortified Doma of Autochthonos|Autochthonos]]. Keep them safe.

– B.'' Kassandra first travelled to the Fortified Doma of [[Mestor (Isu)|Mestor]], finding the Atlantean [[Polemarch]] [[Helmetos]]. After eliminating him, she recovered the [[Dikastes' Helmet|helmet]] piece from his body. Kassandra then travelled to the Doma of [[Elasippos]], eliminating the Atlantean Polemarch [[Chestor]]. After doing so, she recovered a [[Dikastes' Breastplate|breastplate]] from his body. Kassandra then travelled to the Doma of [[Azaes]], where the Atlantean Polemarch [[Legoras]] was at. After eliminating him, she recovered a [[Dikastes' Greaves|pair]] of [[greaves]] from his body. Kassandra next travelled to the Fortified Doma of [[Mneseas]], finding the Atlantean Polemarch [[Bracerdas]]. After eliminating him, she recovered a [[Dikastes' Bracers|pair]] of [[bracer]]s from his body. Finally, Kassandra travelled to the Fortified Doma of [[Autochthonos]] to hunt down her final target, [[Skirtis]]. By eliminating him, she recovered the final piece of the armor, the [[Dikastes' Belt|belt]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra recovered all five pieces of the Armor of the Dikastes from Atlantean Polemarchs.
Section_Trivia: *The name of each polemarch reflects the armor piece they possess or the body part it part it protects. '''Helmet'''os holds a [[helmet]], '''Chest'''or holds a [[breastplate]], '''Skirt'''is holds a [[belt]], etc.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] – [[The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis]]''
